name: Izil's Adventures: Blackfeather's Legacy
description:
A month has passed since Izil lost his treasure-hunting uncle to owl-scurvy. He has chosen to take his mantle and find the Legacy of Captain Blackfeather!

Controls:

- WASD to move, Space to jump/flap/glide.

- C to dig for treasure

- U to toggle thread varying playback speeds. Great for speeding up nautical trips!

- E to interact w/ various things.

- Tab to Pause.
